missing_v3: Class files for Radial Inventory System V3 not found.
main_helpbox:
Thank you for downloading the Radial Inventory System!
If you don't know how to use it, please read the manual from the link below and try using it.
Please use the official Discord (as described in the instructions) to get support.
warn_paramspace:
Parameter optimization is disabled. If you want to automatically remove empty or duplicate parameters, please perform parameter optimization
.
warn_writedefaults:
WriteDefaults are not consistent within the FX layer.
It will still work, but there may be bugs in switching facial expressions.
The error message will disappear even if you switch the WriteDefaults check. If not, please check other avatar gimmicks you are using.
err_overmemory: Total used memory must be less than or equal to {0}.
apply_defaults: Apply the initial state of the prop
v3tov4: Migrate RIS V3 -> RIS V4 settings
found_v3:
A V3 configuration object was found.
Click the button below to migrate this configuration to V4.
dlg_childprop: Only child objects of the object specified as the target avatar can be registered.
err_overprop: The number of props for {0} is over. (max {1})
err_nullcostume: No costume registered for costume set [{0}].
err_nullobject: No object registered for prop [{1}] in {0}.
err_nullobjectandanim: No object or animation registered for prop [{1}] in {0}.
selector_disablebody:
Disable the selected configuration file.
(Files are not deleted.)
selector_description:
Multiple configuration files exist for a single avatar.
Please select the configuration file you wish to use.
settings_applyenabledefault: Apply default state of prop to game object
settings_defaultstatuslimitter: Limit to the initial number of default objects
